    RhnRequestProcessor a custom Struts RequestProcessor that intercepts all of our code struts requests

      • process

        public void process(HttpServletRequest request,
           HttpServletResponse response)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    ServletException
        code run before each request for struts. performs rhn initialization, such as populating Request scope objects based on session. eventually will be where we cleanse formvars as well.
        Parameters:
        request - ServletRequest to process.
        response - ServletResponse to create.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs reading the stream.
        ServletException - thrown if an error occurs in the Servlet.
